definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Medicine Buddha may help you out.
On his left is the Buddha of Medicine.
Medicine Master Buddha is a great doctor.
Bhaisajya Guru is a typical image among them.
sentences.chinese: 藥師佛是其中典型形象之一。

definition: Manjushri, the Bodhisattva of keen awareness
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
another name for Sakyamuni 釋迦牟尼佛|释迦牟尼佛, the historical Buddha
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
boundless life (expression of good wishes)/Amitayus, the Buddha of measureless life, good fortune and wisdom
Maitreya/the Bodhisattva that will be the next to come after Shakyamuni Buddha
(Buddhism) to deliver all living creatures from suffering (idiom)
Samantabhadra, the Buddhist Lord of Truth
